about_the_game:
Welcome to Weeb Store Simulator, the ultimate store management game for fans of games, anime, and nerd culture! Dive into the role of a store owner specializing in selling games, toys, and books/movies/manga to a colorful cast of quirky customers, from collectors to cosplayers.

Customize your store with themed decorations, stock rare and limited-edition items, and host exciting events like midnight manga launches and game release parties. Take on unique challenges as you handle customer demands, manage stock, and keep your store thriving.

Play solo or with friends in co-op mode to strategize, expand, and create the ultimate nerdy paradise! Whether it’s building your reputation or competing to see who can run the best store, the fun never stops in Weeb Store Simulator.
